resources.string:
1. Remove your shoes and socks. 
2. Stand under the height sensor. 
3. Make sure the laser is falling on top of the head before clicking on start. 
4. Click the start button and wait for the reading. 
5. If you can't see the laser pointer, please check the height sensor batteries.

1. Remove your shoes and socks. 
2. Click the start button. 
3. Stand on the weighing scale. 
4. Weight till you see a 'yes' on the weighing scale

1.Take the BP device from the side of the kiosk. 
2. Roll up your sleeves. 
3. Place the arm cuff on the left upper arm and tighten. 
4. Turn on the BP device by pressing On/Off button. 
5. Click the start button on BP device and wait for the reading. 
6. Once you get the reading on BP device, click "Read Data" button on Kiosk.

1.Take the BP device from the side of the kiosk. 
2. Roll up your sleeves. 
3. Place the arm cuff on the left upper arm and tighten. 
4. Turn on the BP device by pressing [ S | T ] button. 
5. Click the start test button on the screen. 
6. Once the screen shows measuring, press the [ S | T ] button on the device again to start it

1. Take the pulse oximeter from the side of the kiosk. 
2. Open clip, place finger inside and close clip. 
3. Press power button on oximeter. 
4. Wait for the reading. 
5. Remove the clip from finger once you get the reading on device. 
6. Click the "Read Data" button on Kiosk.

1. Take the pulse oximeter from the side of the kiosk. 
2. Open clip, place finger inside and close clip. 
3. Press power button on oximeter. 
4. Click the "START" button on Kiosk. 
5. Wait for the results to show on Kiosk.

1. Take the stethoscope and connect it to the kiosk. 
2. Press the button on the stethoscope so that the LED is green. 
3. Press start button on the screen, a dialog should appear. 
4. Place the stethoscope on patients chest and press start recording. 
5. Once the recording is done, press stop recording

1. Take the thermometer from the side of the kiosk. 
2. Remove the protection cap. 
3. Slightly touch the inner Ear with the probe. 
4. Click on the Start button on screen 
5. Press the start measurement key on the thermometer and wait for reading.

1. Put the strip in glucometer and wait for it to turn on. 
2. Put the blood sample on the tip of the strip. 
3. Wait for the reading to appear on the glucometer device 
4. Pull the strip out of the device. 
5. Click on read data 
6. Wait for the device to display reading.
1. Plug in the dermascope and wait for it to be detected. \n2. Place the dermascope at the appropirate point on your skin. \n3. When the image on screen is in focus, press the capture Image button.
1. Click on read data. \n2. Put the strip containing blood sample in the device and press till you hear a beep. \n3. Pull out the strip and wait for the reading to appear on the screen.

1. Take the spirometer from the side of the kiosk. 
2. Press power button on device. 
3. Click on the ready button on Screen. 
4. Breathe in fully and seal the lips around the mouthpiece
and blast all air out as forcefully as possible. 
5. Wait for the reading.

1. Take the pulse oximeter from the side of the kiosk. 
2. Press power button on oximeter. 
3. Click on the ready button on Screen. 
4. Place the device tightly on your wrist as indicated. 
5. Wait for the reading.
It seems you have skipped the mandatory tests. \nGo back and finish the mandatory tests to proceed to reports.
